metadata.title: CVE-2023-45897 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
exfatprogs before 1.2.2 allows out-of-bounds memory access, such as inread_file_dentry_set.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-45897` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

exfatprogs - 1.2.2-1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: exfatprogs package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.2-1build1').
